titles.title: Federal Maritime Commission National Shipper Advisory Committee Act of 2019
Federal Maritime Commission National Shipper Advisory Committee Act of 2019
Federal Maritime Commission National Shipper Advisory Committee Act of 2019
A bill to establish a National Shipper Advisory Committee.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. Ordered to be reported with an amendment favorably.
Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. Reported by Senator Wicker with amendments. With written report No. 116-299.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 592.

bill.summary:
Federal Maritime Commission National Shipper Advisory Committee Act of 2019
This bill establishes the National Shipper Advisory Committee to advise the Federal Maritime Commission on policies relating to the competitiveness, reliability, integrity, and fairness of the international ocean freight delivery system.
